column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " At least I 'm thinking of ideas and trying to get us out of here , Moku . "
#Text=Chong says : " Whoa , whoa , wait a minute .
#Text=We 're all thinking of ideas !
#Text=" Chong says : " Well , then listen to this : If love is the key out of here , then all we need to do is play a love song !
#Text=" Aang says : " How are we going to find our way out of these tunnels ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I have a crazy idea .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Never mind .
#Text=It 's too crazy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , what is it ?

#Text=" Katara says : " I was thinking ... the curse says we 'll be trapped in here forever unless we trust in love ... " Aang says : " Right ... " Katara says : " And here , it says , " Love is brightest in the dark , " and has a picture of them kissing .
#Text=" Aang says : " Where are you going with this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , what if we ... kissed ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Us ... kissing ?
#Text=" Katara says : " See ?
#Text=It was a crazy idea .
#Text=" Aang says : " Us ... kissing ... " Katara says : " Us kissing .
#Text=What was I thinking ?
#Text=Can you imagine that ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah .
#Text=I definitely would n't want to kiss you !
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh , well !
#Text=I did n't realize it was such a horrible option .
#Text=Sorry I suggested it !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , no , I mean ... if there was a choice between kissing you and dying ... " Katara says : " Ugh !
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=I 'm saying is I would rather kiss you than die - that 's a compliment .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , I 'm not sure which I 'd rather do !
#Text=" Aang says : " What is wrong with me ... "
